ingredients.item: 480g pack Waitrose Love Life Strawberry & Banana Smoothie Mix
350ml Rude Health Coconut Drink, plus extra for blending
4 tbsp muesli (such as Waitrose Love Life Berry Muesli)
1 tsp clear honey, plus extra to serve

instructions.step: Place the frozen smoothie mix in a blender with the coconut drink and whizz until smooth, adding a little more liquid if your blender is struggling.
Add 2 tbsp muesli, 1 tbsp chia seeds and the honey. Blend again and once smooth, spoon into 4 breakfast bowls.
Top with the blueberries and the remaining muesli and chia seeds. Serve immediately, with an extra drizzle of honey, if liked.
